summary.span: 为 元素创建特定于主题的外观。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实际外观取决于 用户系统上活动的主题。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 此类的属性使 .NET 可以基于当前主题设置外观。The properties of this class allow .NET to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法中， 对象元素还可以具有子内容，该内容可以是设置属性的单个内容 。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:`CLR 命名空间的 xmlns 前缀。`theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 通常，xmlns 前缀和映射在 XAML 根元素中定义 (未显示) 。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认按钮通常具有较暗的外边框或其他可视指示器，显示用户在按下 Enter 键时将单击的按钮。The default button generally has a darker outer border or other visual indicator that shows the user which button will be clicked if the Enter key is pressed. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| (但是，可能不会在所有主题中设置此属性) (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|
